#summary 自定义页面样式示例
#labels 自定义页面样式示例

去除世界杯期间的状态发布栏背景等
{{{
.publisher{background:none}
.bless,.wc-footer,#worldCup,#worldCups2,#publisher_worldcup_close{display:none !important}
.publisher .world-cup input.submit{background:url("http://xnimg.cn/imgpro/home/home_icon.png") no-repeat scroll 0 -73px transparent !important}
.publisher .world-cup textarea{border:1px solid #BDC7D8}
.publisher .world-cup form{border-bottom:1px solid #BDC7D8}
}}}

Facebook风格的个人主页
{{{
body#profile .col-left{position:relative;top:-80px}
body#profile .col-center{position:relative}
body#profile .navigation,#profile .navigation-wrapper{width:100%}
body#profile .menu-bar{padding-bottom:0px}
body#profile .col-full{background-color:#EDEFF4}
body#profile .col-full .status-holder{padding-left:370px;width:auto}
body#profile .col-full .tabs-holder .tabpanel{width:auto}
body#profile .col-full .tabs-holder{padding-left:370px;width:auto}
body#profile .tabs-holder .tabpanel li:not(.current) a{background-color:#D8DFEA}
body#profile .tabs-holder .tabpanel li:not(.current) a:hover{background-color:#627AAD;color:white}
}}}
